Title: Part 5: Isengard
Text: Saruman has attaked the men of Rohan!But Theoden will get help from Gandalf and Eomer, so i can deal with Saruman in this time.The area around him will be well guarded.. i hope he will not fight me when i tell him that he has lost.He is located ontop of his tower in Isengard.
CompleteText: Here it is, the top of Orthanc the big tower of Saruman the white!I should confront him and tell him that he has lost!And what is that? A Palantir? I should take a small look inside!
